nodes.text: The Jillsaria system was a star system located in the Minos Cluster of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that was home to the sentient Jillsarian species.

The Jillsaria system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square M-20. While the book and its Online Companion both misspelled the system "Jillsaaria," Fry confirmed that it should be spelled "Jillsaria," in reference to the Jillsarian species.
